snippet.title: 63 DAYS || REVEAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
🔔 𝐂𝐎𝐌𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐈𝐍 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒 🔔
🟣 𝕎𝕀𝕊ℍ𝕃𝕀𝕊𝕋 ℕ𝕆𝕎 𝕆ℕ 𝕊𝕋𝔼𝔸𝕄! ► https://bit.ly/63_Days_Steam

About:
Coming of age as a part of the first generation born free, WWII stripped me of my family, home, and future. Now I'm left with only one choice: to get my revenge and independence or die trying. The odds are against us: will our tactics, stealth and teamwork be enough? ✍️

63 Days is our fifth project overall and the second one in this genre. It’s a real-time tactics game that takes place during the 63 days of the 1944 Warsaw Uprising. Sneak, plan, and fight your way through the captivating main story of brotherhood and bravery against overwhelming odds, solo or in online co-op. 🪖

ᴅᴇᴠᴇʟᴏᴘᴇʀ: Destructive Creations

𝕊𝕀𝔾ℕ 𝕌ℙ 𝕋𝕆 ℙ𝕃𝔸𝕐 𝕋ℍ𝔼 ℂ𝕃𝕆𝕊𝔼𝔻 𝔻𝔼𝕄𝕆! 📝
👉 https://forms.gle/Yg18FwLwYTt41wHr6

Useful links:
📌 𝔼ℙ𝕀ℂ 𝔾𝔸𝕄𝔼𝕊 𝕊𝕋𝕆ℝ𝔼 ► https://bit.ly/63_Days_EGS
📌 https://destructivecreations.com 
📌 https://www.facebook.com/destructivecreationsteam

ʜᴀꜱʜᴛᴀɢꜱ:
#Game #Strategy #RealTimeTactics
